description:
A chocolate lover's dream. Our signature warm cocoa cake features a decadent molten center that flows perfectly when tucked into.

Ingredients: Dark Belgian Chocolate, Farm-Fresh Eggs, Butter, Madagascar Vanilla, Whipped Cream Side.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs, Soy.

A fluffy, golden-brown stack of three buttermilk pancakes. Light, airy, and served with a refreshing seasonal fruit garnish.

Ingredients: Buttermilk Batter, Grade A Maple Syrup, Seasonal Berries, Dusting of Powdered Sugar.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.

Cool and refreshing. Three generous scoops of our premium, slow-churned gelato served in a chilled bowl.

Ingredients: Whole Milk, Heavy Cream, Choice of Flavor (Madagascar Vanilla, Belgian Chocolate, or Summer Strawberry).

Allergens: Dairy (May contain Nuts depending on flavor).

Delicate French pastry puffs filled with a silky vanilla cream and drizzled with a warm, velvety bittersweet chocolate ganache.

Ingredients: Choux Pastry, Pastry Cream, Melted Dark Chocolate, Toasted Almond Flakes.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs, Nuts.
